entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
